prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and powerful cannons on its back.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a turtle but has a tough, muscular build.
Design a Pokemon that can swim swiftly and shoot water blasts from its back.
Show me a Pokemon that has a brown and blue color scheme with aquatic abilities.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a large shell and a fierce battle demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in water environments and has a robust defense.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature into a powerful aquatic fighter.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Defensive and offensive with strong water attacks
